resources.string:
- Overall stability improved
- Density altitude calculator improved
- Auto-save on settings page
- Added flight plan list
- New icon and graphics
- Layout fixes and code optimization

- Added searching in a flight plan list
- More compact waypoint edit window
- Added optional True Course and Declination for waypoint
- Added GPS support
- Layout fixes and code optimization

- Google map added for route planning and tracking
- Added Map orientation setting
- Added the Auto-next waypoint option
- Added export to GPX
- Many changes and optimizations
- Reset Total Time on New Flight Plan
